title: Healthy minestrone soup
description: This classic Italian soup will fill your family up with healthy vegetables and help them towards their five-a-day.This meal when served as six portions provides 321 kcal, 17g protein, 27g carbohydrate (of which 8.5g sugars), 16.5g fat (of which 7g saturates), 6g fibre and 1.7g salt per portion.
ingredients: 200g/7oz streaky bacon or lean back-bacon, rind removed, finely chopped
2 large carrots, peeled and roughly chopped
6 celery stalks, trimmed and roughly chopped
2 potatoes, such as Maris Peer potatoes, roughly chopped
1 handful fresh flatleaf parsley, leaves finely chopped
